oai_dc:dc.dc:description: note explaining the curious name of the son of a sorceress.(L V.-9. 4652 and 4651 rev.). The naming of the Bushman Ssu-!kui-ten-tta (or Snore-White-Lying or 'Witbooi'). [A] His mother 'snored' people without a kaross.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The explanation of the name Ssu-!kui-ten-tta (or Snore-White-Lying)
